Talk_43:
<snd:Work>Do you want to recall the deployed
soldiers?
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Work>We Gerudo will protect Lady Riju to our
last breath. You focus on those enemies!
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Pairing the spear troops, with their
lightning weapons, and the barricade's
iron barrels...
I see! <sp:5:0:0>That way they can effectively
defend the area with <clr:0000>serious electric
shocks<clr:ffff>!
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseM_01>A thief! You couldn't have shown up at
a worse time...<sp:5:1:0> No matter. We will keep
Lady Riju safe!
Once we're done with the Gibdos, you'll
be next, Yiga! You better prepare yourself!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Greeting>Hives of monsters have appeared outside
the town walls. It won't be long before
we'll need to deal with this threat.
How should we deploy our forces?
Who should we send and where...

We could spread them out to lightly cover
all the gates. Or maybe a concentrated
force to protect a weakened position?
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>We need to decide who to send where.
I'd like to hear your thoughts.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have the <clr:0000>spear troops<clr:ffff> standing by at the
<clr:0000>north gate<clr:ffff> right now. <sp:5:0:0>Where do you want
to redeploy them to?
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have the <clr:0000>spear troops<clr:ffff> standing by at the
<clr:0000>east gate<clr:ffff> right now. <sp:5:0:0>Where do you want
to redeploy them to?

Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>cannoneer<clr:ffff> is deployed at the <clr:0000>west

Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Work>I will defend this spot with my life while
you strike at the enemy hives!
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Everyone in town is grateful for your help
putting things right here. Sarqso.

You know, we'd previously shut down our
training area due to the sand shroud...
Sudrey was thrilled when we reopened it.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'm sure she'd welcome you there if you
decided to drop by!

The training area is out near the
<clr:0000>Southern Oasis<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're heading there, I'd suggest going
out through the <clr:0000>east gate<clr:ffff>. You can also
ask the <clr:0000>gatekeeper <clr:ffff>for help.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Phew...<sp:5:1:0> That was a tough battle, but
we still managed to make it through.

I've never seen Gibdos work together
in such a coordinated way.<sp:5:0:0> It was almost
like someone was giving them orders.
...Is that even possible? Could they have
a leader?
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>I doubt this will be the end of things.<sp:5:0:0>
We cannot let our guards down just yet.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Unless you have any specific requests,
my plan is to divide our forces between
each gate.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>If you change your mind, please let
me know.
